Room.Name: Matriarch's Hidden Sanctuary
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the Matriarch's private work chamber.
Room.LongDescription: Contrasting with the grandeoise hall outside, this small, rather austere room has dark stone walls and very little furniture. There is a window on one side of the room and rays of sunlight shine down onto Alliyana as she reads the Divine Scripture, as if a divine blessing.
